languages.text: "Как мог{mf||ла} ты вот так предать меня, элантах?" {n}Ирлиэт тянется к оружию, но плотоядные взгляды присутствующих остужают ее пыл.{/n} "Что ж, если такова твоя месть за мое собственное предательство, я принимаю это. Но не позволю так просто добраться до моих братьев!"

traits.locale_text: "Как мог{mf||ла} ты вот так предать меня, элантах?" {n}Ирилиэт тянется к оружию, но плотоядные взгляды присутсвующих остужают ее пыл.{/n} "Что ж, если такова твоя месть за мое собственное предательство, я принимаю это. Но не позволю так просто добраться до моих братьев!"

languages.text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"
languages.original_text: "Как мог{mf||ла} ты вот так предать меня, элантах?" {n}Ирлиэт тянется к оружию, но плотоядные взгляды присутствующих остужают ее пыл.{/n} "Что ж, если такова твоя месть за мое собственное предательство, я принимаю это. Но не позволю так просто добраться до моих братьев!"

traits.locale_text: "How could you betray me like this, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well, if such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you get to my kin easily!"

"How could you betray me like this, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well, if such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you get to my kin easily!"

"How could you betray me like this, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well, if such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I'm not letting you get to my kin so easily!"

"How could you betray me like this, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well, if such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I'm not letting you get to my kin so easily!"

"How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

"How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

languages.text: «¿Cómo has podido traicionarme tan fácilmente, elantach?». {n}Yrliet echa mano de su arma, pero la mirada sanguinaria de los presentes atempera su cólera.{/n} «Muy bien, si así es como deseas vengarte de mi propia traición, entonces lo acepto. ¡Pero no dejaré que mates impunemente a los míos!».
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo has podido traicionarme de ese modo, elantach?». {n}Yrliet echa mano de su arma, pero la mirada sanguinaria de los presentes atempera su cólera.{/n} «Muy bien, si así es como deseas vengarte de mi propia traición, entonces lo acepto. ¡Pero no dejaré que mates impunemente a los míos!».

languages.text: “你怎么能这么毫不犹豫地背叛我，外界人？”{n}伊莉耶特伸手去拿她的武器，但周围人嗜血的目光却让她冷静下来。{/n}“很好，如果你打算这么报复我之前的背叛行为，那我愿意接受。不过，我不会让你这么轻易就靠近我的族人！”
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么能这样背叛我，外界人？”{n}伊莉耶特伸手去拿她的武器，但周围人嗜血的目光却让她冷静下来。{/n}“很好，如果你打算这么报复我之前的背叛行为，那我愿意接受。不过，我不会让你这么轻易就靠近我的族人！”

languages.text: « Comment pouvez-vous me trahir avec tant de facilité, elantach ? » {n}Yrliet tend la main vers son arme, mais les regards sanguinaires des autres calment aussitôt sa colère.{/n} « Très bien... Si c'est ainsi que vous souhaitez vous venger de ma propre trahison, alors je l'accepte. Mais je ne vous laisserai pas vous en prendre aux miens si facilement ! »
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment pouvez-vous me trahir ainsi, elantach ? » {n}Yrliet tend la main vers son arme, mais les regards sanguinaires des autres calment aussitôt sa colère.{/n} « Très bien... Si c'est ainsi que vous souhaitez vous venger de ma propre trahison, alors je l'accepte. Mais je ne vous laisserai pas vous en prendre aux miens si facilement ! »

languages.text: 「よくも簡単に裏切ったな、エランタ」{n}ユリエットは武器に手を伸ばしたが、傍観者たちの血に飢えた視線が彼女の怒りを冷ました。{/n}「いいだろう、それが私の裏切りに対する復讐なら、私はそれを受け入れる。しかし、私の血族にそう簡単に手を出させるわけにはいかない！」
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

traits.locale_text: 「よくも簡単に裏切ったな、エランタ」{n}ユリエットは武器に手を伸ばしたが、傍観者たちの血に飢えた視線が彼女の怒りを冷ました。{/n}「いいだろう、それが私の裏切りに対する復讐なら、私はそれを受け入れる。しかし、私の血族にそう簡単に手を出させるわけにはいかない！」

languages.text: "Wie konntet Ihr mich so leichtfertig verraten, Elantach?" {n}Yrliet greift nach ihrer Waffe, doch die blutrünstigen Blicke der Umstehenden kühlen ihren Zorn ab.{/n} "In Ordnung. Wenn das Eure Rache für meinen eigenen Verrat ist, dann akzeptiere ich sie. Aber ich lasse Euch nicht so leicht meine Verwandten erreichen!"
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie konntet Ihr mich so verraten, Elantach?" {n}Yrliet greift nach ihrer Waffe, doch die blutrünstigen Blicke der Umstehenden kühlen ihren Zorn ab.{/n} "Also schön, wenn das Eure Rache für meinen eigenen Verrat ist, dann akzeptiere ich sie. Aber Verwandten bekommt Ihr nicht so leicht!"

languages.text: "Bana nasıl böyle kolaylıkla ihanet edebilirsin elantach?" {n}Yrliet silahına uzansa da izleyenlerin kana susamış bakışları, öfkesini bastırıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Eğer ki ihanetimin intikamını böyle alacaksan razı geliyorum. Ancak soydaşlarıma o kadar kolay ulaşmana izin vermeyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "How could you betray me with such ease, elantach?" {n}Yrliet reaches for her weapon, but the bloodthirsty gazes of the onlookers cool her rage.{/n} "Very well. If such is your revenge for my own betrayal, then I accept it. However, I will not let you reach my kin so easily!"
